author: ghudson
msg: strlen returns size_t which can be a long on some platforms.  So using
%d as the format is wrong.  Use APR_SIZE_T_FMT instead.  On all
platforms apr_size_t is just a size_t so the format should be correct.
Patch by: Ben Reser <ben@reser.org>
* subversion/libsvn_repos/reporter.c
(write_path_info): Use the correct format for the size_t returned from
strlen.

author: josander
msg: Add r8869 as 1.0.1 candidate and voting for it

author: josander
msg: Bugfix: Some Perl/Inno scripts does not handle "svn --version" without revision
number.
This bug made it impossible to make automated setups (for example daily setups)
and it will now work on all known outputs of "svn --version"
* packages\win32-innosetup\tools\set_version.pl:
(SvnVersion): Bugfix, handles all known outputs of "svn --version"
(SetVerSvnIss): New: Sets the #define svn_pretxtrevision in svn_version.iss
-Occurances of the word release in variables, outputs and functions are
replaced with revision
* packages\win32-innosetup\svn.iss,
* packages\win32-innosetup\templates\svn_version.iss:
-Added pre processor variable svn_pretxtrevision. This is set to "-r" if
svn --version have a revision number and "" if not.

author: striker
msg: * subversion/mod_authz_svn/mod_authz_svn.c
(auth_checker): Choose a better key for caching the parsed authorization
data: the authorization file path.

author: striker
msg: Add caching of the authorization file per connection in mod_authz_svn.
* subversion/mod_authz_svn/mod_authz_svn.c
(auth_checker): Cache the authorization file per connection.
